moves.1. e4: I start with standard king pawn opening.
moves.2... Nc6 3. Bb5: Ruy Lopez, my personal white favourite.
moves.5... Bg4 6. d3 Qf6 7. Nbd2: The f3 knight is heavily guarded.
moves.9... h5: !!! Sacrificing a bishop for a huge positional advantage.
moves.10. Kh2 Nh4: This is where I mess up.

opening: Ruy Lopez (C69), exchange variation, Alapin gambit
